title: firewalls IPS IDS NetFlow etc
extract: IDS (Intrusion Detection System) and IPS (Intrusion Prevention System) both increase the security level of networks, monitoring traffic and inspecting and scanning packets for suspicious data. ... The Intrusion Detection System (IDS) provides the network with a level of preventive security against any suspicious activity.
extract_html: IDS (Intrusion Detection System) and IPS (Intrusion Prevention System) both increase the security level of networks, monitoring traffic and inspecting and scanning packets for suspicious data. ... The Intrusion Detection System (IDS) provides the network with a level of preventive security against any suspicious activity.
